entry.title: Clean Coding: Jumping in and out of a directory

link.title: Clean Coding: Jumping in and out of a directory

entry.summary: Found a great use case for a Python contextmanager:Jump in, then out of a directory with Python.cd "your_dir"do something in therecd ..Can be implemented using a syntax like:with set_dir("your_dir"): do_something()This works great for automation scripts: pic.twitter.com/84bYZ9FchO— Patrick Loeber (@python_engineer) September 4, 2021
